summary: RemusDEX is a fully on-chain, permissionless Central Limit Order Book (CLOB) DEX on Starknet, aiming to integrate Bitcoin liquidity into DeFi. The project emphasizes open-source principles, transparency, and community collaboration. It offers unique features like precise limit orders, deep liquidity, and spot leverage, differentiating it from traditional AMMs. The grant funds will be used to enhance UX/UI, expand trading pairs, and onboard high-volume traders, with specific goals of achieving 1,000 weekly active users and $5 million in daily trading volume.
review: The RemusDEX project presents a compelling case for funding, aligning well with the round's focus on open-source dApps and apps that enhance Web3 accessibility and usability. The project demonstrates a strong commitment to open-source principles, with transparent smart contracts and community collaboration. Its innovative approach to integrating Bitcoin liquidity into DeFi through Starknet is noteworthy, offering potential for significant ecosystem growth. The project's focus on user-centric design, as evidenced by continuous UX/UI refinement and strategic onboarding campaigns, aligns with the round's requirements. However, the application could benefit from more detailed information on how the project plans to achieve its ambitious user and volume targets, as well as a clearer explanation of the project's long-term sustainability and impact.

strengths.title: Open-Source Commitment
strengths.description: RemusDEX adheres to open-source principles, with transparent smart contracts and community collaboration, enhancing the OSS ecosystem.

strengths.title: Innovative Bitcoin Integration
strengths.description: The project uniquely integrates Bitcoin liquidity into DeFi, offering new opportunities for Bitcoin holders and expanding the DeFi ecosystem.

strengths.title: User-Centric Design
strengths.description: Continuous UX/UI refinement and strategic onboarding campaigns demonstrate a strong focus on user experience and ecosystem growth.

weaknesses.title: Ambitious Targets Without Detailed Plans
weaknesses.description: The application lacks detailed strategies for achieving its ambitious targets of 1,000 weekly active users and $5 million in daily trading volume.

weaknesses.title: Long-Term Sustainability Unclear
weaknesses.description: The application does not provide a clear explanation of the project's long-term sustainability and impact beyond initial milestones.

changes.title: Provide Detailed Strategies for Targets
changes.description: Include specific strategies and action plans for achieving the stated user and volume targets to demonstrate feasibility.

changes.title: Clarify Long-Term Sustainability
changes.description: Offer a clearer explanation of how the project plans to sustain its operations and impact in the long term, beyond initial milestones.
